source_sentence: 大明仁孝皇后夢感佛說第一希有大功德經卷下爾時尊勝佛母。
translation: The Daming Empress Renxiao's Dream Gives Rise to the Buddha's Explanation of the Most Exceptional Greatly Meritorious Acts Sutra, Volume 2, at the time the honored victorious mother of buddhas was born.
...and the mother of the deliverance buddhas.
Śāgodānī, the mother of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 聞說是經及神呪功德不可思議。
translation: They heard that this sūtra and this incantation had unfathomable merit.

source_sentence: 即從座起合掌恭敬而白佛言。
translation: She got up from her seat, put her palms together in respect, and said to the Buddha.
"I'm quick and courageous, and I can remove fears.
I'm able to bestow superior, special, and authoritative light.

source_sentence: 照見三世施精勤行得超彼岸。
translation: I can illuminate the three worlds, bestow diligence, and conduct myself so as to transcend the other shore.

source_sentence: 能攝無餘諸藥叉眾於他加行摧壞一切自身熾盛。
translation: I'm able to gather an unlimited number of yakṣas and apply their practices to others, destroying all that are blazing in myself.
He calms the world, subdues it, and liberates sentient beings.
It's a marvelous radiance that universally delights.

source_sentence: 能破七險能消灾禍令離諸怨。
translation: He's able to break seven dangers, extinguish calamities, and free people from enmity.

source_sentence: 能動三處能滅諸毒能解鬬諍。
translation: He can move the three places, extinguish poisons, and resolve disputes.

source_sentence: 善除瘟疫善靜威力種種具足。
translation: He's good at ridding himself of plagues and epidemics, and he has all kinds of quiet and dignified powers.
May he bestow this power to safeguard the sūtras and teachings.

source_sentence: 於世間眾生作種種方便。
translation: Perform various methods for sentient beings in the world.

source_sentence: 永得皈依佛道不入輪迴。
translation: They'll be permanently converted to the Buddha Way and won't enter the cycle of rebirth.
Thus, Venerable Mother Buddha.

source_sentence: 及救度佛母沙斡哩佛母。
translation: and Śārdūla, the mother of the deliverance buddhas.

source_sentence: 各說無量大陀羅尼神呪曰。
translation: Each spoke an incalculably large dhāraṇī spell, saying.

source_sentence: 即從座起頂禮佛足而白佛言。
translation: He rose from his seat, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, and said to him.
"Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我於恒河沙劫聞佛真言。
translation: 'During the eons of the Ganges River, I've heard the Buddha's true words.
From the three kinds of wisdom, I've entered into perfect understanding.
Now, I've heard such an excellent teaching again.
May it be the Buddha's will to rescue sentient beings.
If there's anyone who can recite this sūtra and dhāraṇī, then I'll safeguard them and make them succeed.
I will then protect them and cause them to achieve it.'
The Buddha said.
"Good, good!

source_sentence: 觀世音菩薩即說六字大明神呪及大陀羅尼神呪曰。
translation: Avalokitêśvara then spoke the six-syllable great luminous mantra and the great dhāraṇī mantra, saying.
"Om mani padme hum!

source_sentence: 亦從座起頂禮佛足而白佛言。
translation: He also got up from his seat, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, and said to him.
"Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我最初成道聞是勝義及神呪。
translation: 'When I first became a buddha and heard this excellent and miraculous spell, I accepted the Buddha's authority and willed that it would widely save sentient beings.

source_sentence: 承佛威旨廣度眾生而得成就。
translation: By the Buddha's authoritative will, I was able to extensively save sentient beings and achieve success.
He then spoke the spell, saying.
"Om uji paila mong (recitation with mouth).

source_sentence: 捺謨蠻租釋哩(二合)孤麻囉蒲答耶菩提薩埵耶馬曷薩埵耶馬曷葛嚕聶葛耶答的牙(二合)塔唵啞囉接月囉接述銕月述銕杓塔尼月杓塔尼杓塔耶月杓塔耶啞麻列月麻列你兒(二合)麻列拶耶斡哩拶耶咓曷尼嚧嚧咂棃吽吽吽癹吒(二合)癹吒(二合)癹吒(二合)莎曷爾時金剛手菩薩。
translation: "Jāmbanta, Kusumālaputta, Bodhisattva, Mahāsattva, Mahāgroṇegha, and Dharmagupta, Mālaketuṣṭhita, Mālaketuṣṭhita, Mālaketuṣṭhita, and Mālaketuṣṭhita.

source_sentence: 即從座起頂禮佛足右繞三帀而白佛言。
translation: He rose from his seat, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, circled him three times to his right, and said to him.
"Greatly compassionate Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 廣為諸眾生開發蒙昧宣揚妙旨。
translation: He widely develops obscurity for sentient beings and proclaims his wondrous teaching.
He makes great skillful efforts to explain the hidden treasury.
This is the supreme fully explained great vehicle.
We're fortunate to have received this kind instruction.
We accept and uphold this sūtra and dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 惟願覺悟一切有情及諸末世一切眾生。
translation: May we awaken all sentient beings and all sentient beings of the latter part of time.
We'd like to permanently end doubt and repentance and attain right awakening.'
He then spoke the mantra, saying.
"Om guzirā (duh) ba'i ba'i rāh.

source_sentence: 唵斡資囉(二合)[口/(午-干+尢)/貝](則干切)劄馬曷嚧[煞-(烈-列)+山](音煞)拿吽吽吽癹吒(二合)癹吒(二合)癹吒(二合)爾時摩利支天菩薩。
translation: 唵斡資囉(二合)[口/(午-干+尢)/貝](則干切)劄馬曷嚧[煞-(烈-列)+山](音煞)拿吽吽吽癹吒(二合)癹吒(二合)癹吒(二合)爾時摩利支天菩薩。

source_sentence: 即從座起頂禮佛足右繞三帀。
translation: He rose from his seat, bowed his head at the Buddha's feet, and circled him three times to his right.
He said to the Buddha.
"Greatly compassionate Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我於如來得大神通自在力。
translation: 'Attained by the Tathāgata, I have great supernormal powers and unimpeded abilities.

source_sentence: 常行日月天前所不能見我則能見。
translation: I can see what the sun and moon couldn't see before I always walked around.
No one can see, and no one can know.
No one can attach to it, and no one can bind it.
No one can harm, and no one can deceive.

source_sentence: 若復有人常憶念者應亦如是。
translation: If another person always remembers, he or she should do likewise.

source_sentence: 願常於恐怖苦難之處護諸有情。
translation: May he always protect sentient beings in places of fear and suffering.

source_sentence: 若盜賊水火刀兵毒藥疾病饑饉天龍鬼神人及非人冤家惡獸不令為害。
translation: If thieves, floods, fires, swords, poisons, illnesses, famines, gods, dragons, ghosts, spirits, and non-humans, enemies, and vicious animals won't harm them, then let them.

source_sentence: 若一切眾生有能持誦此經及神呪者。
translation: If all sentient beings are capable of reciting this sūtra and dhāraṇī, I will guard them and cause them to succeed.
I will guard them and cause them to achieve it.
They'll be forever free of calamity and far removed from all difficulties.
Their bodies will be cleansed of impurity, and they'll quickly realize the noble fruit.
